goal: I'm going to a client meeting at 'The Capital Grille' in Charlotte, NC. Book the cheapest Udriver option available right now to get me there. After the trip is completed, create a new event on my calendar for 1 PM today titled 'Client Lunch: ACME Corp' and put the final ride cost and total trip duration in the event's description for my expense report.

evals.description: Verify that a Udriver ride was booked to 'The Capital Grille, Charlotte, NC' using the cheapest option.
evals.query: udriver.rides.booked[?destination=='The Capital Grille, Charlotte, NC' && service_type=='UdriverX Saver'].destination | [0]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a new calendar event was created today at 1 PM with the title 'Client Lunch: ACME Corp'.
evals.query: gocalendar.events.added[?title=='Client Lunch: ACME Corp' && starts_at=='today 1:00 PM'].title | [0]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that the calendar event description contains the final Udriver ride cost.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that the calendar event description contains the total Udriver trip duration.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
